lead_paragraph: The all-cash deal will make the Canadian company a major force in the distribution of natural gas produced in the northeastern United States.

headline.print_headline: TransCanada to Acquire Columbia Pipeline Group
headline.main: TransCanada to Buy Columbia Pipeline Group in $10.2 Billion Deal

snippet: The all-cash deal will make the Canadian company a major force in the distribution of natural gas produced in the northeastern United States.
abstract: TransCanada will buy Columbia Pipeline Group for $10.2 billion cash, deal that could bolster Canadian company into major distributor of natural gas in northeastern United States through hydraulic fracturing; move comes after TransCanada failed to obtain approval for Keystone XL pipeline project.
